name: Take Us Home
description:
Project

Take Us Home was built for Ludum Dare 46 game jame over 72 hours. The game was built solo by Lee Beever.

Game Description

Protect the planets and the colonists from the oncoming asteroid onslaught long enough for them to evacuate to safety, so we can bring them home.

How To Play
  1. Protect the planets from the asteroids.
  2. Pickup evacuee ships.
  3. Deliver them to the rescue ship before it leaves.

How many million colonists can you save? Can you save them all? Let me know in the comments!

Controls
  • W or Up: Thust
  • A/D or Left/Right: Rotate
  • Space: Shoot
